definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: brightness, bright spot, of eruption on skin (NH id., Aram. [[בַּהְרָא]])—´[[בּ]] abs. Le 13:2 + 7 t.; [[בֶּהָָרֶת]] Le 14:56; pl. abs. [[בֶּהָרוֹת]] Le 13:38, Le 13:39; —bright spot (sore, scar, etc.), clean or unclean Le 14:56; following a burn (from fire) Le 13:24, Le 13:25, Le 13:26, Le 13:28, possible beginning of leprosy Le 13:2, Le 13:4, Le 13:19, Le 13:23; but possibly a (passing) eruption [[מִסְפַּחַת]] v:Le 13:6; or due to a boil [[שְׁחִין]] v:Le 13:19; v:Le 13:23; —due to [[בּׂהַק]] (q. v.) Le 13:38, Le 13:39.
